name: Note Taking
backend_requirements: 1. Note model: id, title (required), content (text), created_at, updated_at, pinned (boolean)
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/notes, POST, PUT /api/notes/:id, DELETE
3. Search notes: ?query=text searches title and content
frontend_requirements: 2. Note list shows titles with preview, pinned notes at top
3. Click note to load in editor

api_endpoints.description: List all notes (supports ?query=text to search title and content)
